‚ú®New Teacher Spotlight‚ú®

Meet Lauren Angel, Bradford Kindergarten Teacher!

"Growing up I always loved school and that was mainly because of my teachers. I am going to make sure that this year is amazing for everyone and I am so excited to be a part of the Bradford family!"

¬∑ What drew you to Bradford?
A school with a strong sense of diversity within their students and staff is something very important to me. Bradford has this while also having such a strong sense of community and unity.

¬∑ Why did you choose to work in education?
Working in education is such a fulfilling job where you are constantly learning more while having the opportunity to learn from others - especially students. Children deserve to have a positive and safe learning environment, and that is what I wish to provide them!

¬∑ What are you most looking forward to for the 2020-2021 school year?
I'm looking forward to having the opportunity to be in school again! Last school year was cut short so I am looking forward to safely seeing students face to face again.
